sentences.sContent: On the next page, we'll delve into the world of ethology .
sentences.sContent_eng: On the next page, we'll delve into the world of ethology .
sentences.sCn: 下面一页我们将探究一下动物行为学的世界。

sentences.sContent: In 1965 Goodall earned her Ph.D. in ethology from Cambridge University.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1965 Goodall earned her Ph.D. in ethology from Cambridge University.
sentences.sCn: 1965年古道尔在剑桥大学取得了动物行为学的博士学位。

sentences.sContent: For more information about animals predicting death, ethology and related topics, please check out the links on the next page.
sentences.sContent_eng: For more information about animals predicting death, ethology and related topics, please check out the links on the next page.
sentences.sCn: 关于动物预测死亡的相关信息以及动物行为学和相关话题，如感兴趣请在原文的下一页进行链连。

synos.tran: 动物行动学；道德体系学；个体生态学

words.tran: 动物行为学家；（个体）生态学研究者

trans.tranCn: 动物行动学, 人种学
trans.tranOther: the study of the behaviour of animals in their normal environment
